properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm; Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 6:55AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary and Coastal waters from
Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
